channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car has been abandoned in subway car park, 12th February
item.description:
Has been abandoned in subway car park for over two months been a massive problem doe parking

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: Lots of fallen branches, 12th February
item.description:
The whole of Leckhampton Road needs tidying up Lots of fallen branches everywhere and leaves need clearing on pavements
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 190, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham

item.title: Lots of tree debris on road, 12th February
item.description:
From Daisy Bank Road down Leckhampton Road there is a lot of tree debris by the curbs and the street cleaner should come up and down and clear it as it is blocking a lot of drains with all the rain
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leckhampton Hill, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 road drains blocked, 12th February
item.description:
3 road drain between approximately 76 and 82 Gretton Road, Winchcombe are blocked. This has been the case for a number of weeks. One of the drainâ€™s surrounds (creating a pothole) has recently been repaired.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saint Peters Way, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet
